name: Space Touch
description: Arcade game that works on both touch devices and ordinary computers, destroy obstacles before they hit you. The more you play the more you get tokens to unlock levels and weapons. You can use the 'Timers' to stop time or 'Lasers' to destroy all targets even if they are not destructible.

name: Track Series
description: If you are a TV Shows addict, you will love TrackSeries app for Windows 8.1. TrackSeries will help you to follow, organize and know when your favourite TV Shows have been aired.

name: Football Coach
description: Football Coach helps you stop using whiteboards and markers to explain the strategy prior to the football game with your players, with a laptop or tablet can use this application and teaching plays, strategy and everything you need, and you can delete with a single click .

name: Not a Cat
description: Not A Cat is a platformer game in which Silk, a young basilisk with the power to control the elements, will explore caves and dungeons to save his people. This game has been made by Binary Tales, a student team, and won the online final at the Imagine Cup 2014.

name: Karmacracy
description: La aplicación de Karmacracy llega a tu Windows 8! Con un diseño adaptado al estilo Metro, puedes acceder a los enlaces de moda, y compartir tus propios enlaces, así como tener acceso a algunas estadísticas.

name: RabbitRun
description: Make the rabbit dodge rocks falling from the sky. Survive!! Be the last one who die!!
